regularExpressions.title: Single digit
regularExpressions.description: Matches exactly one digit.

regularExpressions.title: Single non digit
regularExpressions.description: Matches exactly one character which can not be a digit.

regularExpressions.title: Zero or more digits
regularExpressions.description: Matches zero or more digits.

regularExpressions.title: Zero or one digit
regularExpressions.description: Matches zero or one digit.

regularExpressions.title: One or more digits
regularExpressions.description: Matches one or more digits.

regularExpressions.title: Three digits
regularExpressions.description: Matches exactly three digits.

regularExpressions.title: Three or more digits
regularExpressions.description: Matches three or more digits.

regularExpressions.title: Three to five digits
regularExpressions.description: Matches three through five digits.

regularExpressions.title: Negative or positive number
regularExpressions.description:
Matches negative or positive number of one or more digits. To use minus sign in a group
it you can put it as the first sign in the group or escape it.

regularExpressions.title: Zero or negative or positive number
regularExpressions.description: Matches number zero or a negative or positive non zero of one or more digits.

regularExpressions.title: Zero or negative or positive float
regularExpressions.description: Matches number zero or a negative or positive float (non zero).

regularExpressions.title: Negative or positive float or int
regularExpressions.description: Matches negative or positive float or int. (This expression accepts -0 and +0)

regularExpressions.title: One English letter et al
regularExpressions.description:
Matches one English letter, one digit or underscore. This character class is not very
reliable so the alternative writing is to be preferred.

regularExpressions.title: One Swedish letter
regularExpressions.description: Matches one Swedish letter.

regularExpressions.title: Some specific letters
regularExpressions.description:
Matches digit, lower case letters a through f, upper case letters Q, X or Z and money
symbols £, € and $.

regularExpressions.title: Single white space
regularExpressions.description: Matches whitespace characters, like new line, carriage return, tab and space.

regularExpressions.title: Single non white space
regularExpressions.description: Matches non whitespace characters, like letter, digit or other symbol.

regularExpressions.title: Swedish social security number - Initial attempt
regularExpressions.description:
Simple matching of the Swedish social security number. six or eight digits, an optional
hyphen and four digits. This expressions only checks for the right number or digits,
not wether they are correct.

regularExpressions.title: Swedish social security number - Improved attempt
regularExpressions.description:
A somewhat better matching of the Swedish social security number. six or eight digits, an optional
hyphen and four digits.

regularExpressions.title: Swedish car number
regularExpressions.description:
Matches the Swedish licence plate number. Three upper case letters A-H, J-P, R-U or W-Z
followed by 001 - 999 or 00 - 99 plus upper case letter A-H, J-P, R-U or W-Z.
